law.catch_line: Refund of assessment collected from producer.
law.text: Any producer upon and against whom the assessment shall have been levied and collected under the provisions of KRS 247.510 to 247.595, if dissatisfied with the assessment and the result thereof, shall have the right to demand of and receive from the treasurer of the promotion board a refund of the assessment so collected from the producer; provided, the demand for refund is made in writing within ninety (90) days from the date on which the assessment is collected from the producer.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 45, sec. 8, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 180, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 16.
